snippet.title: Ultra Demo Trailer | Battle Gem Ponies
snippet.description:
Get Access to this Demo & More: https://www.patreon.com/YotesMark
And subscribe to keep up with the game's development!

The beefiest update yet, and we're still not finished! Another Demo is on the way. Look out for the Free Public Demo on August 25th, just in time for Everfree Northwest.

Keep up with all things BGP: https://linktr.ee/YotesMark
